htsjdk.variant.variantcontext
Class VariantContextComparator

java.lang.Object
  htsjdk.variant.variantcontext.VariantContextComparator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Comparator<VariantContext>
public class VariantContextComparator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Comparator<VariantContext>

A Comparator that orders VariantContexts by the ordering of the contigs/chromosomes in the List provided at construction time, then by start position with each contig/chromosome.

Constructor Summary

isCompatible

public boolean isCompatible(java.util.Collection<VCFContigHeaderLine> headerLines)
Returns true if the given header lines are from a file sorted according to this VariantContextComparator. For sorting to work properly, the contig in each header line must have the same index.
